answers.answer: Yes! Those photos can make baby's look so weird!! My son looked like his bottom lip was three times the size of his top one and he just has very beautiful lips :p
I've only had one so far at 8 weeks and mine looked like a gummy bear so I have no idea. I think those photos are all funky and alien looking.

I feel so relieved. I was looking and seriously his top lip looks 3 times bigger then the bottom. I'm so glad I'm not the only one who has expierenced this. I was like that doesn't look normal to me. Gahh. It was driving me crazy
I had one at 13 weeks and my babies top lip is huge. And so is it's belly
Yea it's just the way those pictures are. If something was wrong the ultrasound tech would go told you, that's there job
They do look odd sometimes.  My daughter had weird one as well. She came out fine nothing abnormal.

Keep in mind that the pic may also be a bit blurry.  My baby's profile pic looks like his nose and lips were huge, but cute at the same time, and in another profile pic it didn't look quite as big.  Don't worry, as long as the radiologist says the scan is unremarkable, then ur good..

Okay good everything has been normal my whole pregnancy. I'm a high risk pregnancy due to diabetes before pregnancy so it's not actually the ultrasound tech who does it. It's the actual doctor who does all the measuring and checking. She all ways says everything is normal and the baby's weight is normal and development is looking exceptional. So I always leave feeling good but the photo just threw me off a little bit.

Some of my sons ultrasound photos were really freaky looking, one photo looked as if he had severe down syndrome. It worried me, but rest assure its normal. My son was born september 20th and he came out perfectly healthy.
Its because their face may be squished against your uterus causing the off facial features.

question: So I had a ultrasound today I'm 36+4 and  everything was said to be fine. I'm just now looking at the picture they gave me and my babys fave looks odd. Like the top lip looks super huge compared to the bottom. Maybe he's sucking his bottom lip? Or maybe the angle. But it has me a bit worried. Anyone have a odd photo and baby looked fine when born?
title: odd ultrasound photo
